help.synopsis: Create a littleware.TreeNode asset at a given path
help.description:
Create an asset at a given path. The new "folder" asset inherits properties (acl, home) from its parent. The mkdir accepts an optional "atype" (asset type) argument to specify the type of the new node, the default is TreeNode.
mkdir -path /path/to/folder [-atype folder-asset-type] [-comment comment]
